message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $9,000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $9,000. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I can't accept that price. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering it to you for $10,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the benefits the product will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you moving towards my budget. However, $10,500 is still a little steep for me.  Would you consider $9,750?

Hi Bob, I understand that $9,750 is still a bit above your target, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $10,250. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
Hi Alice, thanks for continuing to work with me. I'm getting closer to a budget I'm comfortable with. Could we try $10,000?

Hi Bob, I'm glad to hear you're getting closer to your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession to reach an agreement. I'm now offering the product to you for $10,150. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
